name: XXLify
description: Levels longer than XL get more Xs in the length

maximum-xs.name: Maximum Xs
maximum-xs.description: How many Xs you can have before an L

use-power-notation.name: Use power notation
use-power-notation.description: If enabled, levels above the maximum X limit will be displayed using power notation, i.e. "XXXL" becomes "X^3L"

xxl-plus.name: Enable XXL+
xxl-plus.description: If enabled, levels that are beyond halfway to the next XXL label get a + added to the length

maximum-red.name: Maximum Red length
maximum-red.description: Length in minutes at which red will be at a maximum
